se.umu.jayo0002.iremind.database

Interface TaskDao


  • public interface TaskDao
    A Data Access Object class to communicate with SQLIte database. TaskDao interface for storing data in the database, to provide persistence mechanism. It defines the SQLite data operations, table and columns that will be generated.
    Since:
    2019 -12-09

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(se.umu.jayo0002.iremind.models.Task task)
      It deletes the Task from database.
      void deleteAll()
      It deletes all the Tasks from the database.
      void deleteAllInactiveTasks()
      It deletes all inactive Tasks from the database.

      It returns the Active Tasks only.

      • getActiveTasks

        androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<java.util.List<se.umu.jayo0002.iremind.models.Task>> getActiveTasks()
        It returns the Active Tasks only. It picks ony the Tasks where their status is active, i.e. is 1.
        Returns:

        androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<java.util.List<se.umu.jayo0002.iremind.models.Task>> getInactiveTasks()
        It returns the inactive Tasks only. It picks ony the Tasks where their status is inactive, i.e. is 0.
